      • Ball

            int xStart,
            int yStart)
        Constructor for a ball instance
        Parameters:
        bc - Ball court the ball is residing in
        xStart - start position of the ball in the court: x-coordinate of upper left courner
        yStart - start position of the ball in the court: y-coordinate of upper left courner
